title: Serious team looking for an ADC and TOP laner

replies.body:
Mains: Gnar, Maokai, Swain
IGN: SomeoneNerfMe
Gold 1

ADC main. I play vayne mainly, but i can also play lucian, trisana, kalista, graves, sivir and caitlyn, though most of my ability to carry comes from my vayne play. Willing to play champs that help the team comp and am available a lot of the afternoon. Add me if you're interested, thanks!

Hey Mate, added you in game but ill leave a comment here. I am ADC main and i can play all ADC's fairly well, so have a restricted champion pool is not an issue for me, ill be happy to play whatever ADC for a team composition

Role: Adc M9 :d
Main champs: I pick to counter but Jinx Draven Vayne Trist SIvir And more
IGN: Deep Sanity

IGN - ItsLucky
Role - ADC
Main Champions (In order) - Tristana/Kalista/Ashe/Jinx/Graves/Caitlyn
